basic_information.scholarship_name: Aerospace Alumni Endowed Scholarship in Engineering Physics
basic_information.committee_name: CMS - Engineering and Physics Scholarship Committe

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science majoring in Engineering and Physics who plan a career in aerospace engineering. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Undergraduate student Engineering and Physics major Student aspires to a career in aerospace engineering Two faculty recommendations.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
